title: chicagos-home-for-the-holidays
copy: We invite you, along with your family and friends, to join us to celebrate the season—whether it’s by visiting familiar favorites, exploring current exhibitions, or making art together.   JourneyMaker Families will love making their very own adventure-filled tour with JourneyMaker, a custom tour builder available in our Ryan Learning Center and from your home computer. Choose from eight different themes—like superheroes and time travel—and dozens of artworks to create a special tour all your own.   Holiday Giving
